thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very special hotel
thread.title_full: Very special hotel - Review of Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: travellingah
title: Very special hotel
text:
If you are looking to stay at one of the historical/luxury hotels in Paris and your budget allows it, look no further. This was a splurge for me and the experience was worth every penny. Premier rooms are very spacious and include a balcony. Everything about this hotel, from the moment you enter is of a superior standard. We were celebrating a special occasion and the staff were discreet but thoughtful about everything. I said it was a "once in a lifetime" treat when I stayed here, but I have a feeling I will be back.
